Notification
Date

This Section does not cover articles of heading 9503 or 9508 or bobsleighs, toboggans and the
like of heading 9506.

The expressions ""parts"" and ""parts and accessories"" do not apply to the following articles,
whether or not they are identifiable as for the goods of this Section: (a) joints, washers or the like
of any material (classified according to their constituent material or in heading 8484) or other
articles of vulcanised rubber other than hard rubber (heading 4016), (b) parts of general use, as
defined in Note 2 to Section XV, of base metal (Section XV), or similar goods of plastics (

Main Notes
Sl.No.
Notes
Notification
Date
Notification No

A hull, an unfinished or incomplete vessel, assembled, unassembled, or disassembled, or a
complete vessel unassembled or disassembled, is to be classified in heading 8906 if it does not
have the essential character of a vessel of a particular kind.

Product Description and Export Policy
Itc(hs) Code.

Policy

Cruise ships, excursion boats, ferry-boats, cargo ships, barges and similar vessels for the
transport of persons or goods.

CRUISE SHIPS, EXCURSION BOATS , FERRY-BOATS, CARGO SHIPS, BARGES
AND SIMILAR VESSELS FOR THE TRANSPORT OF PERSONS OR GOODS

Cruise ships, excursion boats and similar vessels principally designed for the transport of
persons; ferry-boats of all kinds

Refrigerated vessels, other than those of subheading 8901.20
Free

Other vessels for the transport of goods and other vessels for the transport of both
persons and goods
Free

Fishing vessels; factory ships and other vessels for processing or preserving fishery
products.

Fishing vessels; factory ships and other vessels for processing or preserving fishery
products :

Trawlers and other fishing vessels
Free
Yachts and other vessels for pleasure or sports; rowing boats and canoes.

Inflatable (including rigid hull inflatable) boats: - - Fitted or designed to be fitted with a
motor, unladen (net) weight (excluding the motor) not exceeding 100 kg
Free

Inflatable (including rigid hull inflatable) boats: - - Not designed for use with a motor and
unladen (net) weight not exceeding 100 kg
Free

Inflatable (including rigid hull inflatable) boats: - - Other
Free

exceeding 7.5 m
Free

7.5 m but not exceeding 24 m
Free

exceeding 7.5 m
Free

exceeding 7.5 m but not exceeding 24 m
Free

Motorboats, other than inflatable, not including outboard motorboats: - - Of a length
exceeding 24 m
Free

Other: - - Of a length not exceeding 7.5 m
Free

Other: - - Other
Free

Tugs and pusher craft.
Free

Light-vessels, fire-floats, dredgers, floating cranes and other vessels the navigability of
which is subsidiary to their main function; floating docks; floating or submersible drilling or
production platforms.

Floating or submersible drilling or production platforms
Free
Other vessels, including warships and lifeboats other than rowing boats.

Patrol or surveillance boat, air-cushion vehicle, remote-operated vehicle
Free

Other floating structures (for example, rafts, tanks, cofferdams, landing-stages, buoys
and beacons).

Inflatable rafts
Free

Vessels and other floating structures for breaking up
Free
